title: Calories in Chick-fil-A Grilled Chicken Sandwich
meta_description: Discover calories in Chick-fil-A grilled chicken sandwich: 320 kcal total, plus full nutrition breakdown including protein, carbs, fat, and FAQs on variations.
h1: Calories in Chick-fil-A Grilled Chicken Sandwich
assumptions: Standard Chick-fil-A Grilled Chicken Sandwich: grilled chicken breast, multigrain bun, lettuce, tomato; no customizations or sides.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations; values based on official Chick-fil-A data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One Chick-fil-A grilled chicken sandwich provides 320 kcal and 28 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in Chick-fil-A grilled chicken sandwich?
What's the protein in Chick-fil-A grilled chicken sandwich?
Are carbs high in Chick-fil-A grilled chicken sandwich?
faqs.a: 41 g total carbs, including 3 g fiber from the multigrain bun.

faqs.q: How much sodium in Chick-fil-A grilled chicken sandwich?
faqs.a: 770 mg sodium, mostly from seasoning and bun.

faqs.q: Does the grilled version have less fat than fried?
faqs.a: Yes, 6 g fat vs. about 25 g in the fried chicken sandwich.
